meanings.sent1: The ice cream was left out too long and became heatless.
meanings.sent2: The heatless room made everyone shiver.
meanings.sent3: The heatless fireplace couldn't warm up the chilly cabin.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as heatless as a winter morning.
meanings.sent5: The heatless cup of tea was no longer comforting.

meanings.sent1: His speech was so heatless that people started to doze off.
meanings.sent2: The heatless performance failed to captivate the audience.
meanings.sent3: The heatless love letter made her laugh instead of cry.
meanings.sent4: The heatless sunset painted the sky with dull colors.
meanings.sent5: Her eyes were heatless, showing no emotion.

meanings.sent1: The heatless party ended early as no one was having fun.
meanings.sent2: His heatless response to the joke fell flat.
meanings.sent3: The heatless game bored the kids within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The heatless atmosphere drained everyone's enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The heatless concert left the crowd disappointed.
